Brakes, Hydraulic 04

ABS ELECTRONIC CONTROL UNIT (STANDARD HYDRAULIC), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Excludes:
1. ABS SYSTEM (HYDRAULIC), DIAGNOSTICS (ELECTRONIC)

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A04-860 All Models 0.5

3. Bleed brake system

ANCHOR PLATE - FRONT AXLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. Disconnect/Connect caliper
4. R&R or replace brake pads on side of vehicle being serviced
5. R&R hub & rotor assembly
6. R&R or replace caliper slide pins
7. Replace wheel seal
8. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Wheel A04-710 All Models 1.4
Both Wheels A04-711 All Models 2.3

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours

BRAKE CALIPER SLIDING PINS, FRONT AXLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R caliper tie bar when required
4. Disconnect/Connect caliper
5. R&R or replace brake pads on side of vehicle being serviced

Notes:
1. If replacing brake calipers or rotors in addition to slide pins, use the brake caliper or rotor replacement operations.

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Four Pins One Axle A04-725 All Models 1.2
Both Pins One Wheel A04-724 All Models 0.8

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
BRAKE PADS (FRONT), Replace        
Opposite Side A04-725-4 All Models 0.4

BRAKE CALIPER SLIDING PINS, REAR AXLE, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R or replace brake pads on side of vehicle being serviced
4. R&R caliper tie bar when required
5. Disconnect/Connect caliper

Notes:
1. If replacing brake calipers or rotors in addition to slide pins, use the brake caliper or rotor replacement operations.
2. If anchor plate removal is required to remove the upper slide pin, use the "Anchor Plate - Rear Axle, R&R and/or Replace" operation

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Both Pins One Wheel A04-726 All Models 1.1
Four Pins One Axle A04-728 All Models 1.6

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours

BRAKE ROTOR (FRONT), R & R and/or Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R wheel(s) and torque to spec.
3. R&R and/or replace hub cap/gasket
4. Disconnect/Connect caliper, R&R or Replace brake pads on side of vehicle being serviced, hub/rotor assembly and wheel seal
5. R&R or replace caliper slide pins
6. R&R rotor mounting bolts
7. Adjust wheel bearings and check/fill lube

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A04-T1 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A04-T2 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A04-T3 All Models 0.0
